effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.
Set: Blade of Justice damage increased by 15% and Wake of Ashes damage increased by 10%.
(4) Set: Wake of Ashes increases your damage done by 8% for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 98,606 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ragged Harvest Golem's Post

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,883 to 4,746 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,746 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
